tool_description: Performs comprehensive system health checks including network connectivity, sensor responsiveness, and overall system integrity.

check_depth.description: Depth of health check (quick, standard, comprehensive)

error_messages: Invalid check depth: Use one of [quick, standard, comprehensive]
Health check timeout: System health check took too long to complete
Partial check failure: Some system components could not be validated
usage: Configure check_depth and enable optional tests with include_network_test and include_sensor_ping. Set generate_report for detailed output.

overall_health.description: Overall system health status (excellent, good, fair, poor)

issues_found.description: Number of issues identified during health check

recommendations.description: List of recommended actions to improve system health

check_timestamp.description: Timestamp when health check was performed
